title: Canada jobless rate surges to 7.8% due to pandemic
description: Canada's unemployment rate shot up to 7.8 percent last month, its biggest monthly increase in more than 40 years, as the economy bled jobs because of the coronavirus pandemic, the government said Thursday. The 2.2 percentage point increase from February was t…
